video_prompt: **Prompt:** Sleeping kitten subtly shifts position amidst soft, round objects. Tiny nose twitches. Blurry background elements subtly undulate. Soft light subtly fades and re-brightens.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A fluffy white kitten sleeps peacefully, nestled in soft pink plush objects resembling peaches, with faint green accents in the background. Soft, diffused lighting emphasizes its serene expression and delicate features. Shallow depth of field. Close-up.
refined_video_prompt: A kitten subtly shifts position while sleeping, its tiny nose twitching. Background elements subtly undulate. Light subtly fades and then re-brightens.
